title: My HUD disappeared
body:
Cant even lv anything at lv 1

Now my team calls me afeeder and reported

replies.body: That's definitely not normal! Did this happen only in a single match or are you still experiencing this if you try testing it in a custom match?

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=10h9XfGz,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-02-14T04:43:39.212+0000)
>
> That's definitely not normal! Did this happen only in a single match or are you still experiencing this if you try testing it in a custom match?


Just one match
Gotcha. If this happens again, definitely let me know so we can look into this further and resolve it.
